text: Hopea siamensis is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree found in Cambodia, Thailand, and Vietnam. It is a critically endangered species threatened by habitat loss. ==References== siamensis Category:Trees of Cambodia Category:Trees of Thailand Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea siamensis
